attributes.action: Restore the use of the St. George's flag on Twickenham Rugby Stadium
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since Mr. Brown has come into office, he has formed a policy to place the Union Jack flag on public buildings as an alternative to the flag of St. George. Perhaps this is reasonable in a number of cases despite the widespread view against it which I have personally experienced. However, the St. George's flag on the roof of Twickenham Rugby Stadium has also been replaced and it is considered by many as disrespectful as Twickenham is the home of ENGLISH rugby... not Scottish, Welsh or Irish rugby.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
